name: sbrbif
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(w2, w1))

stmt.origin: bitri(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(w2, w1), wb(w2, wsb(s0, s1, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(w2, w1))
-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(w2, wsb(s0, s1, w1)))
-| wb(wb(w2, wsb(s0, s1, w1)), wb(w2, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(w2, w1))
-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(w2, wsb(s0, s1, w1)))
-| wb(wb(w2, wsb(s0, s1, w1)), wb(w2, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(w2, wsb(s0, s1, w1)))
-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(w2, w1))
-| wb(wb(w2, wsb(s0, s1, w1)), wb(w2, w1))
-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w2)

body.origin:
|- wb(wb(w2, wsb(s0, s1, w1)), wb(w2, w1))
-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(w2, w1))
-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w2)
-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), w1)

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), w1)
-| wnf(s1, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(w2, w1))
-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w2)
-| wnf(s1, w1)

comment: Introduce right biconditional inside of a substitution. (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-1993.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2016.)
